channel.title: Omshy Games
channel.item:
jetskimast.DesolineInc Jetski Master en Ride the waves in Jetski Master, where you race against time on a powerful jetski. Maneuver through water obstacles, push your speed to the limit, and aim for victory in this thrilling aquatic race. ACTION
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

poppigo123.DesolineInc Poppi Go en Bounce into fun with Poppi Go, where a playful popcorn character leaps from salt shaker to salt shaker. Avoid falling, dodge tricky obstacles, and keep jumping to reach the highest score in this tasty adventure. ACTION
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

croccyhook.DesolineInc Croccy Hook en Dive into Croccy Hook, where your crocodile casts a hook to snatch treasures from the riverbed. Time each throw, pull up valuable items, and aim for the best score in this addictive underwater challenge. ACTION
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

boxiescape.DesolineInc Boxi Escape en Blast off in Boxi Escape, where your box-shaped hero rides a missile through space. Dodge alien spaceships, avoid obstacles, and push for the highest score in this thrilling intergalactic adventure. ACTION
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

anubrix123.DesolineInc Anubrix en Step into the ruins with Anubrix, a Tetris-style puzzle set in an ancient world. Drop and align falling blocks among mystical temples, clear lines, and keep the board from filling up in this thrilling historic challenge. ACTION
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

twentyonem.DesolineInc 21 Master en Chase perfect hands in 21 Master, adding cards strategically to hit exactly twentyone and beat the dealer. CARDS
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

kicktrick1.DesolineInc Kick Trick en Show off your skills in Kick Trick, where every shot is a chance to impress. Bend the ball around walls, aim for the corners, and rack up goals with stylish kicks. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

veggiesamu.DesolineInc Veggie Samurai en Slice through fresh veggies in Veggie Samurai, dashing across the board with swift cuts. Chain combos, avoid hazards, and master your blade in this tasty action game. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

freekicksh.DesolineInc Freekick Shootout en Face the keeper in Freekick Shootout, lining up shots from the edge of the box. Curve the ball, pick corners, and score clutch goals. SPORT
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

coralmemor.DesolineInc Coral Memory en Test your skills in Coral Memory, the classic card-matching game set beneath the sea. Flip cards, match underwater creatures, and train your memory in this colorful and fun ocean challenge. CARDS
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

astrobotbo.DesolineInc Astro Bot Bounce en Launch balls back into the sky in Astro Bot Bounce, using your robot to hit glowing spheres as they fall. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

bladelegen.DesolineInc Blade Legend en Survive deadly duels in Blade Legend, dodging huge blades and outlasting your opponent in the arena. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

hockeyrush.DesolineInc Hockey Rush en Hit the puck hard in Hockey Rush, using your paddle to score on the opposing goal again and again. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

neonbot123.DesolineInc Neon Bot en Guide a glowing robot in Neon Bot through obstaclefilled paths, dodging hazards and pushing for a high score. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

tetrisaqua.DesolineInc Tetris Aqua en Play underwater Tetris Aqua, rotating blocks beneath the waves to complete lines and clear the board. ADVENTURE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

orcaattack.DesolineInc Orca Attack en Swim with Orca Attack, steering a powerful orca past obstacles while firing at evil sea creatures. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

rainbowpra.DesolineInc Rainbow Prance en Guide a unicorn in Rainbow Prance, jumping from cloud to cloud, gathering coins, and avoiding falls. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

leafescape.DesolineInc Leaf Escape en Glide upward on a leaf in Leaf Escape, drifting past obstacles and trying not to crash. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

oceansplas.DesolineInc Ocean Splash en Match four samecolored pieces in Ocean Splash before the sea board fills completely. ADVENTURE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

diamondpic.DesolineInc Diamond Picker en Mine deep tunnels in Diamond Picker 2025, extracting sparkling diamonds while avoiding rocks and hazards underground. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

gosushimi1.DesolineInc Go Sushimi en Hop across platforms as a lively sushi piece in Go Sushimi, collecting coins and avoiding falls. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

waverider2.DesolineInc Wave Rider 2 en Surf big waves in Wave Rider 2, steering your board through buoys and jumps across three worlds. RACING
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

spidermaze.DesolineInc Spider Maze en Crawl through Spider Maze, moving along walls and avoiding traps while searching for the exit. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

catchthesu.DesolineInc Catch The Sushi en Grab fastmoving sushi pieces in Catch The Sushi, stacking them correctly before the belt empties. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

runchiliru.DesolineInc Run Chili Run en Dash through hot kitchens in Run Chili Run, guiding a chili pepper around pots and pans while collecting points. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

chiliflip1.DesolineInc Chili Flip en Follow the heat in Chili Flip, tracking a spicy card among three as they flip and swap places. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

leojump123.DesolineInc Leo Jump en Guide Leo the lion in Leo Jump, hopping between platforms, collecting shiny coins, and avoiding dangerous obstacles. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

snakecatch.DesolineInc Snake Catch en Guide a neon snake in Snake Catch, eating pellets to grow longer while avoiding your own tail. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

bowlingmas.DesolineInc Bowling Master en Show your skills in Bowling Master, carefully aiming throws to score strikes and spares in every frame. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

mystistard.DesolineInc Mysti Stardust en Leap between clouds with a unicorn in Mysti Stardust, collecting shiny coins and avoiding falls through dreamy skies. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

junglegrab.DesolineInc Jungle Grab en Help a monkey toss bananas into the right spots in Jungle Grab, aiming carefully to land each throw. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

treasurech.DesolineInc Treasure Catch en Dive for riches in Treasure Catch, collecting diamonds and gold from the ocean floor with a bold pirate. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

tankbot123.DesolineInc Tank Bot en Control a robotic tank in Tank Bot, dodging bombs from jets overhead while staying on the move. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

musicalmat.DesolineInc Musical Match en Pair musical icons in Musical Match, swapping tiles to align melodies and clear the board. PUZZLE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

pegasusswi.DesolineInc Pegasus Swing en Soar with Pegasus Swing, guiding a winged horse upward between obstacles while collecting shimmering orbs. ARCADE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

aquastrike.DesolineInc Aqua Strike en Attack from below in Aqua Strike, firing torpedoes at ships while weaving through underwater mines. ADVENTURE
[cite: 91, 94, 95, 99] Worldwide
Desoline
3 3+ E All ages

item.title: Apple Hop
item.description: Get ready to bounce in Apple Hop! Jump from platform to platform, collect sparkling coins, and dodge sharp rocks that stand in your way. Precision and timing are key—one wrong hop and it’s game over!

item.title: Apple Hop
item.description: Get ready to bounce in Apple Hop! Jump from platform to platform, collect sparkling coins, and dodge sharp rocks that stand in your way. Precision and timing are key—one wrong hop and it’s game over!
